channel.title: [HOW TO] How To Make A 508 Server [HOW TO]
channel.description: [size=14pt]Download Links Needed :[/size] Jdk 21 : [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html]http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html[/url] 508 Ip Changer : [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?3a5mzylzc1k]http://www.mediafire.com/?3a5mzylzc1k[/url] Winrar : [url=http://rarlab.com/]http://rarlab.com/[/url] [size=14pt]What To Do :[/size] 1)Extract All The Files [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/30j7h4l.jpg[/img] 2)Open Source And Go To Cmd File [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/29o5wlw.jpg[/img] 3)Edit Runserver/Run [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/rutr90.jpg[/img] 4)Put Your Jdk In There And Save It [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2psqc5j.jpg[/img] 5)Run/Runserver [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/10wux36.jpg[/img] 6)Run Ip Changer [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/312y1s9.jpg[/img] 7)Put For Ip 127.0.0.1 And Click Ok [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/e65b44.jpg[/img] 8)Put A Username And Password And Log In [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/1zqeaa9.jpg[/img] 9)You Are Now Logged In =) [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/2illfs7.jpg[/img] [size=14pt]How To Make Yourself Admin/Mod[/size] You Must Be Logged Out To Do This! 1)Go to Bin > Data > Characters > Mainsave [img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2eozeba.jpg[/img] 2)Find Your Username And Open It With > Word Pad [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2znr7gn.jpg[/img] 3)Change Rights To 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Hidden Admin [img]http://i38.tinypic.com/3307ozl.jpg[/img] 4)Save Then Log In Your Account [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/1zqeaa9.jpg[/img] 5)And Enjoy XD [img]http://i34.tinypic.com/dbpe2o.jpg[/img] I Hope You Enjoy XD Please Feel Free To Comment

item.title: [HOW TO] How To Make A 508 Server [HOW TO]
item.dc:creator: @Pker_Ftw Pker Ftw
item.description:
@Pker_Ftw wrote:

[size=14pt]Download Links Needed :[/size]
Jdk 21 : http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk6-jsp-136632.html
508 Ip Changer : http://www.mediafire.com/?3a5mzylzc1k
Winrar : http://rarlab.com/
[size=14pt]What To Do :[/size]
1)Extract All The Files

2)Open Source And Go To Cmd File

3)Edit Runserver/Run

rutr90.jpg860×504

4)Put Your Jdk In There And Save It
2psqc5j.jpg710×343

5)Run/Runserver

6)Run Ip Changer

7)Put For Ip 127.0.0.1 And Click Ok

8)Put A Username And Password And Log In

9)You Are Now Logged In =)
2illfs7.jpg760×502

[size=14pt]How To Make Yourself Admin/Mod[/size]
You Must Be Logged Out To Do This!
1)Go to Bin > Data > Characters > Mainsave

2)Find Your Username And Open It With > Word Pad
2znr7gn.jpg758×374

3)Change Rights To 1 = Mod 2 = Admin 3 = Hidden Admin

4)Save Then Log In Your Account

5)And Enjoy XD
dbpe2o.jpg761×501

I Hope You Enjoy XD
Please Feel Free To Comment

Read full topic
item.source: [HOW TO] How To Make A 508 Server [HOW TO]
